channel.title: Real PvP Looking For Coder
channel.description:
Type of Server [[Intro]] - Hey I'm currently looking for a Coder who specializes in 317's+, and you must have experience if not do not bother posting. I'm looking for a partner to Code & Maintain this server with me it will be hosted on VPS and will be based on Pking.
Type - It will be created on a heavily modified Delta and I have already found the client and source and it does not need MUCH work needed but a day or so if we tried.
Why - I want to create this server because I seen a server back than who used this source and client it did not even change the name it was called SilentxPvP it had 100+ People but that server was hosted terribly and yet it was a sweet and sour success.
I will not go into much Depth as I am currently going to check another forum for coders, but if your interested post below with experience, servers you've worked for, and anything else that would catch my attention as to choosing you.

item.title: Real PvP Looking For Coder
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You can’t request programmers on this site.

Read full topic

item.title: Real PvP Looking For Coder
item.dc:creator: @Pluck Pluck
item.description:
@Pluck wrote:

Type of Server [[Intro]] - Hey I’m currently looking for a Coder who specializes in 317’s+, and you must have experience if not do not bother posting. I’m looking for a partner to Code & Maintain this server with me it will be hosted on VPS and will be based on Pking.

Why - I want to create this server because I seen a server back than who used this source and client it did not even change the name it was called SilentxPvP it had 100+ People but that server was hosted terribly and yet it was a sweet and sour success.

I will not go into much Depth as I am currently going to check another forum for coders, but if your interested post below with experience, servers you’ve worked for, and anything else that would catch my attention as to choosing you.
